LLMs Used in This Project
-------------------------

1. OpenAI GPT-4 (via OpenAI API)
   - Usage: Script generation, text summarization, and content suggestions.
   - Endpoint: https://api.openai.com/v1/
   - Compliance: User data sent to OpenAI is subject to OpenAI's privacy policy and terms of service.
   - Attribution: Â© OpenAI, L.L.C.

2. [Add additional LLMs here if used, e.g., Google Gemini, Anthropic Claude, etc.]

Notes:
- All AI-generated content is reviewed before publication.
- No sensitive user data is sent to LLM providers without user consent.
- For more information, see our privacy policy.
